Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I've been playing KSP since its first release, and have a good grasp of the game. I didn't come here looking for advice on docking, landing, ship building, etc... As you can see, this is my first post on the forums. I had hoped my first post would be something more impressive, but first, i need to know a few things. I'm planning on posting a mission summary and/or craft showcase and i need to know how to insert pictures. I realize that i have to upload them to imgur or another similar site, but what do i put after that? This may be a stupid question that im sure almost all of you know the answer to, but exactly what should i type if i want to put in one of those imgur album spoilers instead of simply adding a link to the album?

Thanks in advance, and i hope to implement this stuff in my (hopefully) amazing second post!

for single images, you have to instert the URL of that pic (ususlly ending with .jpg or .png) like this:

for imgur albums, read here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums%21
